quotes.quote: A son is a son till he takes him a wife, a daughter is a daughter all of her life.
To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter.
A daughter may outgrow your lap, but she will never outgrow your heart.
A mother's treasure is her daughter.
A daughter is a bundle of firsts that excite and delight, giggles that come from deep inside and are always contagious, everything wonderful and precious and your love for her knows no bounds.
A daughter is a miracle that never ceases to be miraculous...full of beauty and forever beautiful...loving and caring and truly amazing.
A daughter is a treasure- and a cause of sleeplessness.
Our daughters are the most precious of our treasures, the dearest possessions of our homes and the objects of our most watchful love.
A daughter is one of the most beautiful gifts this world has to give.
Old as she was, she still missed her daddy sometimes.
Daughters understand as they grow older, they become good friends.
A daughter can lead to baldness, but the remainder of the road is just as smooth.
What the daughter does, the mother did.
We gotta start teaching our daughters to be somebodies instead of somebody's.
The more a daughter knows about the details of her mother's life - without flinching or whining - the stronger the daughter.
Not every daughter mourns the loss of a mother.
Do not forget to tell your daughters God made them beautiful.
Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a million dollar Stradivarius to a gorilla.
Generally if you're a daughter in a Mexican family, no one wants to tell you anything; they tell you the healthy lies about your family.
Good daughters make good mothers.
And thou shalt in thy daughter see, This picture, once, resembled thee.
Daughters go into analysis hating their fathers and come out hating their mothers. They never come out hating themselves.
A daughter is the happy memories of the past, the joyful moments of the present, and the hope and promise of the future.
Daughter are angels sent from above to fill our heart with unending love.
Maybe it's just a daughter's job to piss off her mother.
A daughter will follow in her mom's footsteps so make sure to set a good example.
If daughters couldn't soften a man, then nothing would.
An undutiful daughter will prove an unmanageable wife.
A daughter is a day brightener and a heart warmer.
Daughters can sometimes be too serious, teach them to laugh and not take life too seriously.
